price: Ka ce: "Dã akwai waɗansu abũbuwan bautãwa tãre da shi, kamar yadda suka faɗa, a lõkacin, dã (abũbuwan bautãwar) sun nẽmi wata hanya* zuwa ga Ma'abũcin Al'arshi."
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: * Dã su abõkan tãrayyar sun nemi hanya zuwa ga Allah dõmin su yãƙe shi sabõda Ya ce Al'arshi Tãsa ce, Shi kaɗai, dõmin su sãmi nãsu rabon, sabõda Al'arshi tã haɗiye kõme, har da su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna maʿahu ālihatun kamā yaqūlūna idhan la-ib'taghaw ilā dhī al-ʿarshi sabīlan
